title: The Silver haul
creator_credit: James Mellor, Editorial Film Productions and Guy Blanchard
brief_description: Details of the British herring industry including buying, selling, marketing and making a haul. Demonstrates the laying of the nets and landing of fish; the gutting and grading, either by hand of mechanically, of the catch which may be kippered, salted, qucik frozen or shipped fresh on ice. Summarizes the history of the industry.
